title: So I beat the main quest in Fallout 3 for the first time...
body:
Then I find out I die at the end, and that I can spend 5 dollars on a dlc so I can keep my character and explore the other half of the map I never got around to exploring.

I mean, I guess 5 bucks isn't that much, I am just upset that I have to pay for something an RPG should include by itself.

Edit: Just realized I actually got the DLC with the GotY version. I feel dumb, but still think that it is a sleazy tactic.
